invocations.description: Returns true if the special area extra policy given is enabled, false otherwise.
invocations.ex:
if not getareaextrapolicy('SpecialArea1', 'lure') then
	setareaextrapolicy('SpecialArea1', 'lure', true)
end
invocations.exDescription: It'll enable 'SpecialArea1' extra policy 'IgnoreWhenLuring' if it was not enabled.
